name: Dark W3Schools: Easy on Eyes
description: This style will turn W3Schools into its darkened version. No more white glare while savoring html,css concepts! Features: 1. Easy on eyes 2. Almost all the images (like logos, icons) have been edited to show black background. 3. Pleasing design 4. No Ads Any feedback will be appreciated.
additional_info: V0.1 :HTML and CSS tutorial pages are finished V0.2 :Front page(main page)partially done (some logos remaining) V0.2(a) :Fixed url matching for urls starting with www. Note: For red thin scrollbars use this extension(for chrome)
